column4: and on that note - i say again...  has anybody created debs for the new openoffice full 2.0 stable release?  If not how do i do so myself?
i assume theres a tutorial on the wiki somewhere?
Debian packaging for a beast like OO.o isn't simple
I am going to go for my LPIC-1 Linux certification this Wed
Do you want to be a systems admin for a living?
If not, there isn't much of a point
I am a Web / Systems Admin consultant, I know this :)
How much faster is it? Does switching between tabs with image intensive sites speed up? Thats a beast in 1.07
lets put it this way..  Imagine going from being totally crippled (like me) to a 4 time sprinter olytmpic gold winner
you wouldnt hit a disableed guy would you?
